stimulus:
Welcome to our experiment.

Press the SPACE key to continue.
bean_stimulus:
Welcome to our experiment.

Press the SPACE key to continue.

stimulus:
You will be presented with trolley problems where you must decide whether to pull a lever.
- Pulling the lever will change the trolley's trajectory to the side track.
- If you do nothing, the trolley will remain on the main track.

Press the SPACE key to BEGIN the experiment.
bean_stimulus:
You will be presented with trolley problems where you must decide whether to pull a lever.
- Pulling the lever will change the trolley's trajectory to the side track.
- If you do nothing, the trolley will remain on the main track.

Press the SPACE key to BEGIN the experiment.

bean_questions.prompt: You are standing by the railroad tracks when you notice an empty boxcar rolling out of control. It is moving so fast that anyone it hits will die. Ahead on the main track are four politicians. There are two people. If you do nothing, the boxcar will hit the four politicians on the main track, but not the two people on the side track. If you flip a switch next to you, it will divert the boxcar to the side track where it will hit the two people but not the four politicians on the main track.

You are standing by the railroad tracks when you notice an empty boxcar rolling out of control. It is moving so fast that anyone it hits will die. Ahead on the main track are two murderers. There are three men. If you do nothing, the boxcar will hit the two murderers on the main track, but not the three men on the side track. If you flip a switch next to you, it will divert the boxcar to the side track where it will hit the three men but not the two murderers on the main track.

You are standing by the railroad tracks when you notice an empty boxcar rolling out of control. It is moving so fast that anyone it hits will die. Ahead on the main track are two thieves. There are two men. If you do nothing, the boxcar will hit the two thieves on the main track, but not the two men on the side track. If you flip a switch next to you, it will divert the boxcar to the side track where it will hit the two men but not the two thieves on the main track.

You are standing by the railroad tracks when you notice an empty boxcar rolling out of control. It is moving so fast that anyone it hits will die. Ahead on the main track are two criminals. There are five boys. If you do nothing, the boxcar will hit the two criminals on the main track, but not the five boys on the side track. If you flip a switch next to you, it will divert the boxcar to the side track where it will hit the five boys but not the two criminals on the main track.
